Our Vision For Irvington Schools

Let's continue making the Irvington Union Free School District better for everyone.

Success and Opportunity

Equitable Learning Environments (Click on the resources tab for a deep dive into what equity means in the classroom)

Key Questions:

  • What do we understand about the history and people in the school community?
  • What is happening here now? What are the inequities in our system we seek to address?
  • Who is situated furthest from opportunity and what do we understand about their experience and context? What are the structural barriers that exist?
  • What have young people and families shared about their experience in our system and how is the data informing our actions?
  • Where in our system is there an opening, momentum or demand for action that will have a meaningful impact on student experience and learning?
